Definition at line 113 of file mail.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( microtime( true ) < $this->LastCallTime + $this->Timeout / 1000000 )
                        {
                              usleep( $this->LastCallTime + $this->Timeout / 1000000 - microtime( true ) );
                        }
                        
                        $Security = & get_package( 'security' );
                        
                        $To = $Security->get( $To , 'email' );
                        $Subject = $Security->get( $Subject , string );
                        $Message = $Security->get( $Message , string );
                        
                        if( mail( $To , $Subject , $Message , 'From:'.$From."\r\n".'X-Mailer: PHP/'.phpversion() ) === false )
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while sending email' ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
